name: SH13LD
description:
SH13LD is a game developed for the Ludum Dare October 2014 event and was made by Gnow Bros, an Indie development company. You have the choice of either holding the mouse in your hand or playing it like you would on a surface (this is the default setting).

Use keys 1 and 2 to buy from the shop, cost of the item is in white.

The Esc key is used for quitting the game, run out of lives and you are prompted with a message to restart or not.
